scripts.init: npx pnpm@$(npm pkg get devDependencies.pnpm | tr -d '"') install
scripts.check-outdated: npx pnpm@$(npm pkg get devDependencies.pnpm | tr -d '"') outdated --recursive
scripts.update: npx pnpm@$(npm pkg get devDependencies.pnpm | tr -d '"') update --recursive
scripts.build-watch: (nx run-many --target build --skip-nx-cache || true) && nx watch --all run-many -- npm run build
